text: Spencer Pratt (born August 14, 1983 in Los Angeles, California) is an American television personality. He is best known from the MTVs series The Hills. Pratt and Heidi Montag were housemates in the January 2013 series of Celebrity Big Brother (UK). title: Spencer Pratt
